articles.title: Physicists Reveal Mysterious Black Holes Could Be Devouring Planets’ Cores - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Physicists have suggested that primordial black holes might interact with planets in unanticipated ways. According to the theory, these black holes might consume planets' cores, hollowing them out. This concept, if proven, could provide new insights into the …
articles.content: A theory has been proposed suggesting that primordial black holes (PBHs)black holes that may have formed in the early universecould be interacting with planets and asteroids, potentially consuming th… [+4451 chars]
